message.name: ERR_FV_REQUESTED_START_OR_END_DATE_EMPTY
message.locale: Either Requested Start Date or End Date must be entered.

message.name: ERR_XRV_REQUESTED_START_DATE_BEFORE_EARLIEST_START_DATE
message.locale: The Expected Start Date cannot be before %1d. Please enter a new start date.

message.name: ERR_XRV_APPROVAL_START_END_DATE_SAME_REQUESTED_EXPECTED_START_END_DATE
message.locale: The approval expected Start Date or End Date must be different from requested expected Start Date or End Date.

message.name: ERR_XRV_REQUESTED_START_END_DATE_SAME_CURRENT_EXPECTED_START_END_DATE
message.locale: The requested expected Start Date or End Date must be different from existing expected Start Date or End Date.

message.name: ERR_XFV_REQUESTED_START_DATE_EARLIER_EQUAL_REQUESTED_END_DATE
message.locale: The requested Start Date must be earlier or equal to the requested End Date.

message.name: ERR_XFV_APPROVAL_START_DATE_EARLIER_EQUAL_APPROVAL_END_DATE
message.locale: The approval Start Date must be earlier or equal to the approval End Date.

message.name: ERR_XFV_REQUESTED_START_DATE_NO_MODIFY
message.locale: The Requested Start Date cannot be modified as an Actual Start Date has been entered.

message.name: ERR_XFV_REQUESTED_END_DATE_NO_MODIFY
message.locale: The Requested End Date cannot be modified as an actual End Date has been entered.

message.name: ERR_XFV_REQUESTED_END_DATE_LATER_EQUAL_REQUESTED_START_DATE
message.locale: The requested End Date must be greater than or equal to the requested Start Date.

message.name: ERR_XFV_APPROVAL_END_DATE_LATER_EQUAL_APPROVAL_START_DATE
message.locale: The approval End date must be greater than or equal to the approval Start Date.

message.name: ERR_XFV_ALREADY_WAIVER_EXIST
message.locale: Already a waiver has been requested and submitted for approval.

message.name: ERR_XFV_APPROVAL_COMMENT
message.locale: Approval Comment must be entered.

message.name: ERR_XFV_REQUEST_COMMENT
message.locale: Request Comment must be entered.

message.name: ERR_APPROVE_MILESTONE_WAIVER_SECURITY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: User must have supervisor role privileges to approve this milestone waiver.

message.name: ERR_REJECT_MILESTONE_WAIVER_SECURITY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: User must have supervisor role privileges to reject this milestone waiver.

message.name: ERR_MILESTONE_WAIVER_XRV_NOT_SUBMITTED_NO_REJECT
message.locale: The milestone waiver cannot be rejected as the waiver status is not submitted.

message.name: ERR_MILESTONE_WAIVER_XRV_NOT_SUBMITTED_NO_APPROVE
message.locale: The milestone waiver cannot be approved as the waiver status is not submitted.

message.name: ERR_MILESTONE_WAIVER_FV_REJECT_REASON_EMPTY
message.locale: Rejection Reason must be entered.

message.name: INF_APPROVAL_APPROVESUBJECT
message.locale: Waiver Request for %1s Milestone in Case %2n of type %3s for %4s has been approved.

message.name: INF_APPROVAL_APPROVEREASON
message.locale: The waiver request was approved by %1s on %2d. The details of the approval can be reviewed within Case %3n.

message.name: INF_APPROVAL_REJECTSUBJECT
message.locale: Waiver Request for %1s Milestone in Case %2n of type %3s for %4s has been rejected.

message.name: INF_APPROVAL_REJECTREASON
message.locale: The waiver request was rejected by %1s on %2d. The details of the rejection can be reviewed within Case %3n.

message.name: INF_WAIVER_APPROVAL_SUBJECT
message.locale: Waiver Request for %1s Milestone in Case %2n of type %3s for %4s submitted for approval.

message.name: INF_WAIVER_APPROVAL_REASON
message.locale: The waiver request was submitted by %1s on %2d. The request can be reviewed and approved within Case %3n.

message.name: ERR_MILESTONE_WAIVER_XRV_NO_SUPERVISOR
message.locale: The waiver request could not be submitted for approval because no supervisor could be determined.
